name: Trapped! (NathGMG)
description:
You play as Sky, and a bunch of weird scientist put you in a.... uhhhh.... I actually don't what's the actual name that you're in... Let's just assume you're in a laboratory...?? or an observation room?

You are TRAPPED inside a laboratory...  ??? You are an experiment, you were signed to  escape the lab....  or else...

There are 4 Different Endings, try not to die.. 

From the creators of Sky Land - Chapter 1, introducing Trapped!

HIGH QUALITY point and click game! that's pretty much it... 

Did you know that this game was made in PowerPoint? Pretty Cool right!

The best part is, IT'S FREE! DOWNLOAD IT NOW! 

(AS LONG AS YOU HAVE POWERPOINT INTALLED)

Trapped! created by Sky Lavadia

THE GAME WAS INSPIRED BY TELLTALE'S WALKING DEAD, RIDDLE SCHOOL and The Henry Stickmin Collection
